context: Can you Turn off the BackLit LED anytime or no? And does the mouse have LED as well. Can I turn that off as well. What is the warranty on this?
response: You can turn off the keyboard backlight any time. The mouse is lit but you can't turn the mouse off.  I think the warranty is a year by not for sure. I love mine
DPI is for your screen.  I don't think a mouse has anything to do with DPI (dots per inch).

context: Will this adapter provide the audio from Netflix or the TV app too? Or Just game audio
response: Any audio which passes through your Xbox One will also be passed through the adapter.  Think of your Xbox One as your amplifier when it comes to your headset.  If you are watching Netflix, HBO Go, TV via Xbox, or any app that is installed on your Xbox One, it will be transmitted through this adapter.

context: It's this game (Japanese) playable in US Console?
response: PS3's are region free, so yes. No worries there. My copy plays perfectly on my PS3, and it is a US console.
